target.name: compile-main
target.depends: init, gentables, genmatchers, gengen, genfactories, gencompcls, write-excludes-file

target.name: compile-gentests
target.depends: compile-tests, geninspectors, gencontain, gensorted, genloneelement, genempty

target.name: runslow
target.description: include tests tagged Slow when running tests

target.name: testfromjar
target.description: test from test.jar after jarring test class files

target.name: test
target.description: test using test class files stored in directory tree

target.name: jardoc
target.echo:
We don't have any java in this project to document, but Sonatype requires a javadoc jar so we just jar this text file.
Move along, move along. Nothing to see here.

target.name: redeploy
target.description: redeploy a release using a different scala version tag
